title: Sugar Bowl And Cover, ca. 1930
markings: On underside of foot, stamped in black: MAJOLIKA, SMF [conjoined] in shield, SCHRAMBERG Handgemalt 62; 3213 faintly impressed.
dimensions: parts a & b) 10h x 16.2w x 12d cm (3 15/16 x 6 3/8 x 4 3/4 in.)
description: Hemispherical bowl (a), with two roughly D-shaped tab handles and low cylindrical foot; slightly domed circular cover (b) with D-shaped tab handle in center.  Brushed underglaze decoration of light brown field with geometric panels in yellow, orange and dark brown; dark brown band at mouth, white interior.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sugar Bowl And Cover, ca. 1930.
ca. 1930. Glazed earthenware. Gift of Torsten Bröhan. 2001-20-7-a,b.
